00008  //Creates random 5 chars password containing [A-Z and 0-9]
00009  function randPw()
00010  {
00011         $pwd_tmp = "";
00012         for ($i=0; $i<6; $i++) {
00013       $d=rand(1,30)%2;
00014       $pwd_tmp .= $d ? chr(rand(65,90)) : chr(rand(48,57));
00015     }
00016         return $pwd_tmp;
00017  }
00018 
00019   function mailReset($email, $uname, $pword)
00020   {
00021         ini_set("SMTP", MAIL_SMTP);
00022 
00023     $subject = "Europlanet NA1 Matrix: Password reset! ";
00024 
00025     $headers  = 'MIME-Version: 1.0' . "\r\n";
00026     $headers .= 'Content-type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1' . "\r\n";
00027     $headers = "From: " . MAIL_FROM . "\n";
00028     $headers .= 'Cc: ' . MAIL_TO . "\r\n";
00029     $headers .= "Reply-To: " . MAIL_REPLY;
00030 
00031     $from = "-f" . MAIL_FROM;
00032 
00033     $message = "Dear " . $uname . LF . LF;
00034     $message .= "Your password has been reset to: ". $pword . LF;
00035     $message .= "You may now access the server at http://europlanet-na1.oeaw.ac.at/matrix/ ";
00036     $message .= "with username " . $uname . " and the new password." . LF;
00037     $message .= "You can change your account details, including your password, any time via ";
00038     $message .= "'My Account' beneath the 'Log out' button. " . LF . LF . LF;
00039     $message .= "Sincerely," . LF . LF . LF . "The team" . LF . LF;
00040 
00041     mail($email, $subject, $message, $headers, $from);
00042   }
